Text.Page:
{@LinkCreature:6#1061#Gutrend brigands} and {@LinkCreature:6#1062#pillagers}! Because we haven't been killing enough of these things.

Those are the two main groups giving us trouble now. I know you're sick of the speech, so how about we skip it and you just head out there?

Fantastic! Thanks. Wonder which group is going to pop up next.

Maybe we can do something with these headpieces. Something that would serve as a warning to the rest.
Going with the standing around approach, are you? How's that working for you?
